description: From head +‎ word. Compare West Frisian haadwurd (“noun, substantive, headword”), Dutch hoofdwoord (“headword”), German Hauptwort (“noun, substantive, headword”), Swedish huvudord (“headword, keyword”).

entries.meaning: A word used as the title of a section, particularly in a dictionary, encyclopedia, or thesaurus.
(grammar) Any word which may be modified by an adjunct.
examples: In "a very discerning car shopper", "shopper" is the headword.
